name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fat piece of fatty fat fat

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes the news less depressing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension replaces variations of the word 'Trump' with variations of the word 'Fatty' in the hopes of making online news a little more bearable through fat shaming the world's most notorious fat shamer
